thread.title: Live eSports coverage heading to the BBC for the first time ever

title: Live eSports coverage heading to the BBC for the first time ever
text:
Live eSports coverage heading to the BBC for the first time ever 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
The BBC will broadcast the League of Legends World Championships when the quarter finals come to Wembley on October 15.
